website_summaries.verdict: A fan favorite among fitness enthusiasts, this 12-week journal is sure to impress.
pros: Includes spaces for weekly workout and nutrition goals
Daily food log marks vitamins, water, and caloric intake
cons: Some buyers wish the journal covered more than 12 weeks

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I didn't thinking writing everything down would work, but it really does! My trainer loves it too because she can just look through and see a pattern if there is one; or she can see that Tuesday I ate really little but due to stress my workout was on point. Even though I can't lift my arms. So we work together but this fitbook is really good for common ground. I love how it shows goals and you get a win for doing well. mine is chicken wings or amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maris Swid

customer_reviews.title: A little spendy, but well thought out and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a very well-thought out book - well done Fitlosophy! I didn't realize it when I purchased it, but I love the 12 week and weekly goals. Great reminder to stay focused on what's important. Two reasons I only gave 4/5 stars: 1. the book is relatively expensive for something that can only be used for a one 12 week period. 2. I bought the book primarily for strength training workout recording - I use myfitnesspal for meals and such; would love to see a simpler book for those of us really into fitness and wanting purely workout related recording space.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Has everything u need
customer_reviews.text: I am a Certified Personal trainer and have to say I am impressed. The best way to get started on a healthier lifestyle or to meet a goal that u have set for yourself is to plan it out ahead of time. Have a solid plan and set your schedule. The planner is very detailed with tracking food intake, resistance training, cardio, etc. I heard of the planner from another trainer who had suggested it for a client. So I decided to grab one and check it out. I have to say, for anyone who has decided rat today is the day to get started and needed to set a schedule. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: NytaTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Preferred method of tracking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, carry with you. Very helpful to have food and exercise all in one location and reflect back on. Nice size book, so I take mine to the gym to update as I go. Small enough to fit in my bag, yet big enough to enter my info. Funny, how I used to be focused on using an app but didn't like one more thing tieing me down to my phone. I didn't like writing things down. Now, I prefer using the Fitboo as it works better and I can include emotional or stressful situations to reflect on later.
customer_reviews.author: L Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good if you already know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.text: If you already have an exercise regimen, this book is for you. If you are hoping to get started, this book may leave you feeling less equipped than before you purchased it. There is no scaffolding in place to build your confidence in excercise/nutrition. In my opinion, if you are a beginner, spend your money on a simple planner or diary. It will do you just as well.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this journal and really looking forward to using it for the new year. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed with the quality. Many of the pages were stuck together at the top and tore when I attempted to gently pull them apart, and the binding and materials used all feel very cheap. I read so many positive reviews for this product and I have to assume that there are ones going out that don't have the same issues as mine did, but my experience with it was overall negative.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I got this book to have something more put together than a binder I was using, and I love it! So much so, that I bought one for my sister as well. It helps me track food and workouts and plan out my week and small enough that I can keep it with me, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! I've been tracking and planning for a couple of weeks, and it's been really helpful having meal and workout plans in one place to coordinate. I also love the weekly and monthly recaps, and the ratings for each food day and workout. REALLY helpful for learning and making modifications to lifestyle. Only recommendation would be adding in daily tracking of either calories or protein/carb/fat grams as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! I had been looking for so long for a fitness journal that allowed me to track everything on a daily basis and this was it! I loved that I could plan out my weeks ahead of time and know exactly what workouts I was planning on doing. We all know it's easier to walk into the gym with a set plan, instead of wandering around :) I used this book for the full 12 weeks while I was training for a half marathon and sprint triathlon and it was sooo helpful! I much prefer writing things down since I've never been able to get used to using apps. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Manzo

customer_reviews.title: If you're about serious about creating a healthier lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to lose weight, here is a great starting point. Each week I improved on healthier eating habits and exercising. The first couple of weeks were rough because I wasn't use to tracking everything and then following up. Like everything else when trying to get in shape you have to put in the work and this applies to fulfilling your weekly goals as written and being realistic. But after the fourth week when I became consistent with writing down meal plans and workouts and actually following these goals, did I see results! This is a great start for those who are serious about creating a healthier lifestyle! I look forward to purchasing the next 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Lew

customer_reviews.title: I love the Fitbooks
customer_reviews.text: I love the Fitbooks! I use them for tracking diet, workouts, goals.. I am a visual person so having to write everything down is very helpful to me. The compact size is great for toting around in my laptop case for work and school and to the gym. Don't change a thing Fitbook!
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for tracking progress: Nutrition and Fitness!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been a great motivator for me and has helped me tweak my nutrition and track my lifting progress. I am able to bring it with me every where because of its compact size, and it does not stand out to much when I bring it around with me at the gym. I will definitely be buying another fitbook, but I would recommend an upgrade to the pen as it is cheaply made and broke during the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: Love it and the pen works well which surprised me Haha
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this so far. I just started using it today and so far it is so handy and I hope I can stick with it. I have a hard time remembering to log things in my phone/fitbit app so this is easier to remember to do because I leave it open next to my desk and it is small enough to take anywhere without it being so obvious what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought 2 just to keep track longer. Thanks to this book keeping me grounded and organized (among making healthier life choices) i lost 10 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Miss Megs

customer_reviews.title: Helpful journal!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! My coaching is all on line so when I go to the gym it’s up to me to push myself... this really helped me up my weights and also quick access to keeping a nutrition journal The only negative feedback is the spiral binding started to come undone at the top of the book 😩
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the fitbook lite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was just a larger version of the fitbook lite. In this one my favorite part of the lite one is missing. The positive thought for the day. I will not order this version again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilou Scott

customer_reviews.title: Useful for people following their own fitness plan, less so for those doing videos etc. Food parts are great.
customer_reviews.text: I like some parts but the exercise portion wasn't what I expected. Its all about the exercise type and amount of reps which I am not really ready for yet. I have only been doing pilates beginner fitness videos so far and it's not really easy to put into the fitness part of the book. So I am sort of wasting every other page and tracking on a wall calendar instead. I do like it for my food tracking though as it seems pretty versatile for that and the journaling parts are really good for jotting down how you did each week. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for 12 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of junk I wouldn’t use in the book, but others may. Personally, I wouldn’t buy it again as I have found more practical ones that last longer at more economical prices here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This will jump start your transformation!!!
customer_reviews.text: So my pages were stuck together a wee bit at the edges, but were easily separated. Love the layout of the journal. Good for weight lifting peeps, and the casual hula hooper (that's exercise right?) I love the ability to meal prep for the week then track actual dietary intake day by day. Each day has its own page complete with goals and feels about the day. A bit pricey but I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: My 90 day health companion!! :)
customer_reviews.text: The best little book ever! I'm doing a weightloss competition with my co-workers and this fitbook has helped me create weekly and daily goals(nutrition and excercise) & has kept me accountable while also encouraging me :) I love that you can color-in or mark off each serving in each food group as well as your water and sleep. Thaaankyou fitbook! after these 90 days, I'll probably order another:) Can't wait to try the pregnancy version for my friends too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Accountability & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting a new fitness journey, and I researched some good tools to help me. The Fitbook came up several times. I’ve been using it for two weeks. It’s so great. I like the weekly planning and the self accountability. The book is lovely quality too.
customer_reviews.author: edonnab7

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This little notbeook is great. It has room for diet, exercise, and how you felt about the meal/workout. It is portable enough tor the gym, but fits a lot of great info in it. I love the elastic band attached as well. I wish there were more lines for lifting workouts, but I just double up on those to fit everything in. I love the weekly/monthly progress pages as well. Definitely a great tool to keep you on track. I have tried several other journals before, but this is the only one that has every thing I would have added to the others in one place.
customer_reviews.author: clegend

customer_reviews.title: A little too busy for me
customer_reviews.text: This might be a great book/journal for some but it was a little too busy for me. I need things go be in a simpler fashion and I didn't feel that I had the time to put into this type journal. You might say just leave blank the things you don't want but I don't like all l that extra in the way. Be sure to study the sample pictures before you purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: sisweeks

customer_reviews.title: Was requested
customer_reviews.text: This was given to someone as a gift. Therefore, neutral rating only.
customer_reviews.author: Double Bubble Gum

customer_reviews.title: Very In Depth Fitness Journal
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this fitness journal, but I just wish it was less expensive, as it's on the higher end of the fitness journal market. However, it's organized perfectly. It leaves enough room for all my meals, and it's cool that it allows me to keep track of weights and reps, though I typically do classes and such where that isn't as applicable. Anyway, I really enjoy it and plan to get another soon.
customer_reviews.author: ANK

customer_reviews.title: Motivational Book
customer_reviews.text: Just started back working out after a injury set me back a couple months. I used to write everything in a notebook and it became hard to organize . This book gives me motivation, helps me keep track of everything I need to get back into my workout routines. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this but prefer the 6 week planner layout
customer_reviews.text: Love this but prefer the 6 week planner layout.Other than that the size is great, pen is super handy and found this very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Previously Used by Someone Else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at a slight discount due to package damage. It did not have the pen, and has someone’s personal information in the front cover.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this book
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book! It has everything you need right in it. It has lots of helpful tips and information. Also it has space to write your goals and each week you write what was not good about the week and what was good about the week! But you have to write in it everyday to make it useful! I been using this book for 2 weeks and I already been eating a lot healthier and I lost 7 pounds in two weeks! Def worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been stuck in a rut trying to lose weight and this little book has helped me get on the right track. It has everything you could want, laid out simply.
customer_reviews.author: TDL

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: It’s TINY! As tall as my IPhone. Good layout probably but will return as my handwriting is too large and I know I’ll make a mess of it. Not free return though, $6 to send back!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Burch

customer_reviews.title: workout foodlog
customer_reviews.text: LOTS of info, better used for ppl lifting weights, but still well organized. workouts on one side, food log on the other. the spiral binding came out once or twice in my gym bag, but i like it and will get another one in a month when its over. this book holds 3 months. reviews every week so you can decide on changes for the upcoming week.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Book, but made well
customer_reviews.text: Book arrived in a timely manner but when looking through the book, I noticed a large hole in one of the pages. Book had full workout logs and food logs for each of the 7 days in twelve weeks. If it wasn't for the large hole it would be a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great journal
customer_reviews.text: It works really well! However probably better if bigger and more space for notes. Otherwise the size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ray Arren

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite items to track my workouts and food
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite items to track my workouts and food. I know there is an app for everything but sometimes good old fashion writing things down is where it is at. This book comes with a pen and I never leave home for the gym without it!
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Fitbook! It's got space for me to log everything I am doing to get in shape. It's awesome for planning out your workouts and meals on a daily, weekly, or monthly time frame. Plus, there are places for measurement and weight tracking. I love the little motivational quotes each week. This is really keeping me on track, and I never go anywhere without my Fitbook!!
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: SMALL AND HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOKS. THEY HELP ME KEEP MY GOALS AND I CAN CARRY IT EVERYWHERE WITH ME.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Option
customer_reviews.text: This was my third fitness journal and i'm glad that it was. For me personally it would have been a little overwhelming to start with solely in terms of planning (since i was just finding my feet), but by the time i got it i already had some established routines and it helped me stick to my outlined schedules/ensure that i fit in time to exercise. The smaller size was great for purse/gym bag toting around however it didn't leave any room to really break out macro/micro nutrient intake levels, although the smiley faces were a good touch as were the weekly summaries etc.
customer_reviews.author: jlb5105

customer_reviews.title: Great for reviewing weeks and goals
customer_reviews.text: This is my third fitbook - I find it very helpful for keeping up with goals and to review my week. It makes me a little more mindful of what I am doing. Normally I find these at Target but going into Target costs me $150! Glad I found these here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomended
customer_reviews.text: I suggest that if you are just starting out to go for the Lite Version of the FitBook as it has a different format and helps. Using the FitBooks I have taken my weight loss and diet to th enext level
customer_reviews.author: Nce59

customer_reviews.title: Exercise And Food Diary
customer_reviews.text: Fitlosophy Fitbook: Fitness and Nutrition Journal to Plan, Track, and Reach Health and Weight Loss Goals by Fitlosophy is a twelve week exercise and food log. For example, a typical week gives a person the space to record their time, flexibility, cardio, and strength training activity. There is also space for recording body weight and another space for writing down your workout goals. There is also an area where you can write down your reward for doing so and fit tip reminders such as making sure to drink at least 64 ounces of water each day (page 5), a nutrient tracker, and spaces where a person can write what inspired them (inspiration area).
customer_reviews.author: Stella CarrierTop Contributor: Writing

customer_reviews.title: I am sorry I wasted my money on this book.
customer_reviews.text: It is Not what I expected. The spaces for recording are too small. It does Not include spaces for everything I want to record.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome journal to keep track of pretty much everything
customer_reviews.text: Awesome journal to keep track of pretty much everything. I use it everyday and it helps me better plan and keep track of things. Front cover of the book did come damaged though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great tool!
customer_reviews.text: i dont use the nutrition part as much because i use my fitness pal but i love tracking my workout! if youre committed to your workout youll love this as a learning tool
customer_reviews.author: Fatima O.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. I sat down first thing I got it and wrote down all my goals. I like the idea of 12 week goals, it's also the length of the body transformation contest I'm in so that was a nice surprise. So people bash on this because they say there's too much wasted space. I call bs. I like to take notes in the margins. Not to mention if every inch of every page was fille, It wouldn't be as simple to use. I like simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Still a good
customer_reviews.text: Kind of slacked on using this as I keep the fitbit log online. Still a good item
customer_reviews.author: Marie Johns

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE these books! I'm a Weight Watchers member and have been doing that for some time, but when I started using these Fitbooks it really helped me stay on track with food AND activity! I'm currently on my 3rd book and have lost about 50 pounds since starting to use them!
customer_reviews.author: deemarie619

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and has all the info I am looking to track.
customer_reviews.author: KateM

customer_reviews.title: Size is great, format is perfect for what I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Size is great, format is perfect for what I use it for, only thing I would change is to add an area each day to include a small space to add what I am grateful for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accountability for your exercise routine or dietary intake.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fairly quick and packaging was adequate. If you have trouble tracking exercises or dietary info, this should make for a great companion to your daily routine. Highly recommend this if you have trouble keeping track of exercise routines or caloric intake.
customer_reviews.author: Don Haskins

customer_reviews.title: its so nice to be able to keep all my health stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: My little Fitbook comes in handy. its so nice to be able to keep all my health stuff organized.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Format is great, wish it was more than 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The layout of this book has everything you could ask for when trying to get healthy. The only complaint I have is that for what you are getting it is a little on the pricey side. You only get 12 weeks worth and then you would have to buy a new book if you wished to continue. So I do recommend it as a tool but I wish that is wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love to plan and track and this was absolutely helpful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: I love this book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I am old school with tracking and I like that the pen is always with it and can track your daily weigh ins and water intake. Very helpful product!
customer_reviews.author: sandy gray

customer_reviews.title: I love the layout of the fitbook
customer_reviews.text: I love the layout of the book, I just wish it was about 1" bigger in size so the spaces for writing in your workouts weren't so narrow. Not a deal breaker at all, but you need to write quite small.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: No week 3?
customer_reviews.text: My book seems to be missing week 3... I thought I was going crazy so I re-checked and had my husband look just in case... nope, it’s not there. It’s a bit pricey to be missing a whole week. I’ve used this before (with week 3 lol) and overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Franzo

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product many times during the past couple of years. I'm disappointed to find that pages in this book are bound in upside down and out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Evans Peabody

customer_reviews.title: Great little book
customer_reviews.text: Using every day so far. Keeps my goals in mind and keeps me off the phone at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jean-Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Helps you stay accountable to your health goals every day.
customer_reviews.text: I'm staying on track with my diet and exercise goals and this book makes it SO easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ciocca

customer_reviews.title: I love this book
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. I love this book! But, I wish it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Dumale Creations

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love fit books. I use them often to stay on track.
customer_reviews.author: Kell GARST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this book. I have bought 3 of them now!!!! Best book ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for weightloss management!
customer_reviews.text: Way easier to keep track of what you doing. And you right it down in pen, you can't cheat! Unlike the app, you can just erase it and start over!
customer_reviews.author: Cory SmithTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my boyfriend, and it was exactly what he wanted. He loves that there is a place to write what kind of weight training he is doing. This is rare in a fitness book. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great book to keep track of your workout and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book to keep track of your workout and it's perfect to keep in gym bag and small compact definitely recommend getting one or two of them
customer_reviews.author: Geovanny De La Rosa Nieves

customer_reviews.title: I really needed a new tracker but this book is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a new tracker but this book is a little smaller than expected. I use my trackers to write my workouts out and take to the gym and I don't think they will fit on one page.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this journal. Great for keeping workouts. I don’t use nutrition Part.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyPower

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitness planner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fitness journal. I have not been 100% consistent in using it but when I do use it daily it helps to keep me accountable as well as motivated and focused on goals. If you are a goal setter this book is helpful. I am not much of a goal setter and am trying to use the goal setting practices in this book to help me better make and achieve goals. If you need a planner that is small and easy to fit in your purse that will help you plan and document your exercise, meals and goals, this is a great buy. I personally love the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: ... I thought it was going to be but I love it none the less
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I thought it was going to be but I love it none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Nefertiti

customer_reviews.title: Good book to map and plan health and fitness.
customer_reviews.text: This is good for tracking, it would be even better if the app was as good at the book to monitor on the go. You guys really need to create an app that mimics the book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, perfect details
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitness log book! It has a real focus on goal-setting, and is the perfect size to carry around with me everywhere - out of sight means out of mind. It is really helping me set my goals and follow through with them. The format is excellent - there is enough space to write things down, but not a lot of wasted space. I also like the black cover. I ended up not using the pen because I don't care for blue ink, only black, but that's a small quibble. I will be buying many more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: This book is exactly what I needed to get my ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is exactly what I needed to get my life together on my weightless journey! I will be purchasing again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenSheezy

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything that you need to keep track of your diet and exercise regimen, the only thing is that is to much money for a journal.
customer_reviews.author: William and Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I love this book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I actually get excited about working out and recording what I ate that day. I love filling it out and I get bummed out it I didn't work out that day and the page is blank. My favorite part of this book is the weekly wrap up. It helps me see what I need to change and what is working for me. I used to use an app to track everything, but I noticed I would forget to record workouts and meals. The app didn't allow me to see what was working and what wasn't because I could only see that current day.
customer_reviews.author: April Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the concept of this book
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the concept of this book, however some spaces for writing are just too small to get in what I needed to write.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! This is my second one. It works writing everything down to keep you focused and motivated.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman68

customer_reviews.title: Nice journal
customer_reviews.text: I started doing P90X and wanted to be able to track both my workouts and nutrition, and this little journal is doing the trick. I'll be able to get a whole round of P90X in the journal. Got one for my husband too.
customer_reviews.author: dkbell1969

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Help me stay encourage and on top of everything! Made my goal of losing 35lbs!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheOnlySkeet

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: This is particularly good if you have access to a gym or home gym because there are spaces for exercises/reps every day. I just started using it and am hopeful it will help me reach my post-baby goal :)
customer_reviews.author: Simone C

customer_reviews.title: This book is great for keeping track of all health-related items
customer_reviews.text: This book is great for keeping track of all health-related items. It is helping me get back on track with my nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great, but pen didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I really like it so far, but I took off a star because the pen didn’t work :(
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Durable quality tracking book. Plenty of room for workout and food tracking. Can take a beating getting thrown into a bag or having a weight dropped on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Krasnow

customer_reviews.title: love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to log your workouts and what you eat everyday. I am very pleased with fitbook!
customer_reviews.author: Riversong

customer_reviews.title: ... the second time and I can honestly say I love it! If I were to have created a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product for the second time and I can honestly say I love it! If I were to have created a journal to suit my own needs, there would be very few changes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like all of the information that this asks
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the information that this asks. Have not used it fully yet, but it is very motivating.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice and graphic. However its very expensive to be buying every 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I use this a few times a year. Great for the gym; not too big
customer_reviews.author: Nikilette Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing ! It's so detail, portable, and fun
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new fitbook!
customer_reviews.text: The Fitbook is small and easy to carry around. It helps me stay on track with eating healthy, drinking plenty of water, and exercising. It is motivating b/c you can set weekly goals for yourself and set rewards. I do wish it had a little bigger space to write calories, fat, and carbs for each meal/snack. But I am making it work with the space provided.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have the discipline
customer_reviews.text: Only buy it if you can keep up with the documentation in it. This is for people who love their Day Timer or other Planners.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and fits right into my purse so I can take it every where.. makes it easy for me to track what I eat and weekly accomplishments.
customer_reviews.author: Donyell

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise completely satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wish it was just a little bit bigger. Otherwise completely satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Miner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I like it very much. I can adapt it for my exercise routine and variety activity.

customer_reviews.text: writting down my exercises and logging my foods helps me make adjustments where needed, and gives me an outlook on what works

customer_reviews.title: otherwise excellent way to track
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use when you train with a trainer...otherwise excellent way to track!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for first-timers
customer_reviews.text: This book is good for first-time fitness folks. I bought this for my 16-yr old daughter to keep track of her goals in fitness and nutrition. She really likes it and found it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy in ND

customer_reviews.title: Compact & useful
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 2nd fitbook. I am currently in a weightloss challenge that lasts 12 weeks. This book allows me to track goals, measurements, food journal, exercise & water intack. As the heading applies this is a compact book that travels well and yet allows me to maintain all the information I can use to follow my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn J. Mcmunn

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent fitness planner and food tracker that has all of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fitness planner and food tracker that has all of my fitness needs in one small book.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

product_meta.title: Fitlosophy Fitbook: Fitness Journal and Planner for Workouts, Weight Loss and Exercise, Black Single (12-Week)
product_meta.description: Color:Blackfitbook works: 76% of fitbookers lose weight in the first 12 weeks. Whether your goals are to tone up or slim down, it's important to write down goals. With fitbook, you'll first establish a game plan by setting 12-week goals and then break them down into smaller, weekly goals. Need help setting your 12-week goal? Download our fitbook+ lite goal-setting app for FREE to help you get to the “why” behind your fitness + nutrition, then track your progress toward your goal in fitbook! Available for iPhone and Android devices in the app store. Each week you'll plan workouts, meals, and rewards that will help motivate you to make time in your busy schedule and stay on track. fitbook also tracks your daily progress by recording workouts, food intake, and other health related stats. Finally, at the end of each week you'll reflect on your goals, log accomplishments, and reward yourself. fitbook is structured enough to help you reach your personal goals, but flexible enough to be used with any exercise program (p90x, Crossfit, Personal Training),nutrition plan (Weight Watchers, Paleo, Zone, Biggest Loser, DASH), or digital fitness device (fitbit, Jawbone UP, FuelBand, Basis). Write it down. Make it happen. Get fitbook: the personalized, flexible and functional line of fitness and nutrition journals that offer a unique system to plan for success, track progress, and reach your goals.
feature_bullets: (1) Black Philosophy Fit book - 12-week Fitness and Wellness Goal-Setting Journal
Weekly wrap-up pages to reward progress, reflect on your week, and journal thoughts and inspiration.
5. 5 inches square, includes pint-size pen, strap to mark your place, sleeve to stash recipes/workouts, and slot for your gym card, extra cash, etc.
Includes a FREE download for the fit book+ goal setting app to help you set a realistic, healthy 12-week goal and provide you with a printer-friendly download of your goals.
Includes daily and weekly planning pages, plus space to log before and after measurements.
Daily food log to record healthy eats, including trackers for nutrients, vitamins, water and sleep. Also includes a daily workout page to track strength training, cardio, classes, and flexibility.
